thread.title: Stag party's freaky Devon-themed stripper request revealed

author: Neil Shaw
title: Stag party's freaky Devon-themed stripper request revealed
text:

The UK's leading stag party organiser has revealed what lads really got up to in 2018 - including one very freaky Devon-themed stripper request.
StagWeb has trawled the records to reveal where stag parties went, what they did and what they got up to.
The company's records revealed some interesting facts about stag parties, including that Bristol is the most popular UK destination, most stag parties are held in June and the average spend on activities, entertainment, food and drink is £4,270.
StagWeb's Director of Operations Steve Roddy said, "Just like wedding budgets, stags are spending more and travelling further for their stag weekends. Bristol is the most popular stag weekend destination and the average stag expenditure has risen. Despite worries elsewhere over Brexit, more stags than ever opted to head to Europe and early indications for 2019 show it's set to be yet another record breaking year." Read More Devon's best Airbnbs for large groups of family or friends "Our study also bursts some stag myths, only 10% of groups went on an organised drinking activity and just 1 in 10 involved strippers or nudity (which is less than hen weekends). Yet a huge 91% of stags booked an activity that involved sport or adventure. So what happens on tour can quite happily be posted on Facebook.”
StagWeb has revealed its weirdest stag requests and stories of the year.
On one occasion when the stags hired a stripper it turned out she was the groom's ex-wife. Despite the initial surprise/confusion she did perform her routine.
And another story has a weird Devon twist. A request for a limousine with a stripper in a Torquay United football kit has been listed among StagWeb's three weirdest requests of the year.
What the fascination with The Gulls is hasn't been revealed, although they famously get scored on more than a stripper at a stag do. Torquay United players watch on during the shootout against Basingstoke Town (Image: Tom Sandberg/PPAUK)
The other two were a ladyboy stripper (because the groom had history) and a photo of Bill and Ted to be left in the groom's bedroom.
